attributes.action: pass a law permitting full frontal nudity in national newspapers, magazines, and TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is ridiculous that page 3 of tabloids and lads mags are restricted to topless only photographs. The whole human body is beautiful. It is time for this taboo to be abolished. we shouldn't be ashamed of the body. By all means restrict depictions of sexual activity between people but just full nudity should not be restricted
